name: Northprey Massacre (teaser)
description:
This is the teaser of a game that I've been working on for the past few months.

Northprey Massacre is a PSX found footage horror game.  
You are a police investigator, you are about to join a search party to track down a killer on the loose. But things are not going as the way it should...

I hope you enjoyed it! If you find any bugs, glitches, or misspelling, please contact me or comment it down below. 
(this is my first upload on itch so sorry if something is wrong)

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
E - Interact
Shift - Run
F12 - Hide Hud
Esc - Pause   

CHANGES

08.23.

  • Added a map to easily navigate through the maze.
  • Changed the FOV of the knight.
